post.body: You are so clutch, baby! Thanks a grip, mang! =D
Holy hell that was amazing! Damn him making me second guessing putting a few bucks on Hotlanta... =/
-- my entire name mirrors the Three Wise Men (who visited baby Jesus). Nifty, eh?
-- hells yeah! We finna' tag team that table and WHOOMP! There It Is. =D
http://twitpic.com/sl3o - So who's kicking the extra point? =D
:: Hockey fight LULZ -- http://snipurl.com/9goil (Where'd HE learn how to fight?!)
:: w00t, my personalized license plates arrived at the DMV finally! =D
:: Well played, Sproles. Well played. Wow.
:: Heading off to spin @ Blake's! (Party people, throw your hands in the air and wave them... like there were no repercussions!)
:: 2 shots Hypno, 2 shots Henny, 2 shots Goose... Yeah, call the fight already. =P
:: 200 Chick-Fil-A nuggets on the wall, 200 Chick-Fil-A nuggets...!
:: Tried playing Silent Hill Homecoming. Can't play it alone, even in broad freakin' daylight. Need courage... BAD.
:: Had the craziest dream ever where I was the equivalent to Andrew Ridgely of a pop duo. And Matt C. was the proverbial George Michael. XD
:: Time to teach a neophyte the ways of the wheels of steel!
:: license plate in front of me on a BMW M3 -- HYPHY M3. Oh sure, that fad lasted... *heh*
:: No one on the corner got swag like me. Christmas = all bueno. =)
:: Time for the Bay Area tour - from Mt. View to Gilroy to Oakland... gotta' love holiday travel. /slight sarcasm
:: I think I've found my new regular barber. =)
:: Gosh, I hafta' wait til 2009 to see if I get a second interview? Yeah, that's not unsettling. Not at all. =/
:: Silly Megan... can't say you didn't deserve this sooner or later... http://snipurl.com/8bogy
